name: concurrentfetcher
description: A javascript class for managing concurrent fetch requests.

scripts.build: tsc --removeComments && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format amd --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.amd.js && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format cjs --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.cjs && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format es --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.es.js && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format iife --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.iife.js && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format umd --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.umd.js && rollup dist/concurrentfetcher.js --format system --name "ConcurrentFetcher" --file dist/concurrentfetcher.system.js

author: asicscreed
